original: @86b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @86b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i ba su dh'a r'a de by'a mandal sya bi dhi:/
analyzed: shr'i ba su dh'a r'a de by'a mandal sya bi dhi:/
translated: Śrīvasudhārādevyāmaṇḍalasya vidhi.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The ritual of the maṇḍala of the glorious goddess Vasudhārā.

original: dpal lha mo nor rgyun ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / aom bcom ldan 'das ma dpal ldan 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal lha mo nor rgyun ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / aom bcom ldan 'das ma dpal ldan 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Oṃ. Homage to the Blessed One, the glorious noble Vasudhārā.

original: dang por re zhig kha la sogs pa dag par byas nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma nor rgyun ma'i brtul zhugs blangs te /
analyzed: dang por re zhig kha la sogs pa dag par byas nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma nor rgyun ma'i brtul zhugs blangs te /
translated: First, having purified one's mouth and so forth, one should take up the discipline of the Blessed Noble Vasudhārā.

original: mgo bkrus shing gos gtsang ma bgos nas me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang dri dang zhal zas @87a * //
analyzed: mgo bkrus shing gos gtsang ma bgos nas me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang dri dang zhal zas @87a * //
translated: Having washed one's head and put on clean clothes, one should arrange flowers, incense, lamps, perfume, food,

original: la sogs pa bshams te /
analyzed: la sogs pa bshams te /
translated: and so forth.

original: re zhig dang por me tog sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: re zhig dang por me tog sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: First, one should prepare the flowers.

original: aom na mo bha ga wa te pushpa ke tu r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a y'arha te samyaksam buddh'a ya /
analyzed: aom na mo bha ga wa te pushpa ke tu r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a y'arha te samyaksam buddh'a ya /
translated: Oṃ. Homage to the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened Buddha, the King with the Flower Topknot.

original: tadya th'a / aom pushpe pushpe /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom pushpe pushpe /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ puṣpe puṣpe

original: ma h'a pushpe su pushpe /
analyzed: ma h'a pushpe su pushpe /
translated: mahāpuṣpe supuṣpe

original: pushpo dbha be /
analyzed: pushpo dbha be /
translated: puṣpodbhave

original: pushpa sam bha we /
analyzed: pushpa sam bha we /
translated: puṣpasambhave

original: pushp'a ba k'i rne sv'a h'a /
analyzed: pushp'a ba k'i rne sv'a h'a /
translated: Puṣpāvake naye svāhā.

original: zhes pa lan gsum gyi me tog sbyang ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa lan gsum gyi me tog sbyang ngo //
translated: With this mantra, one should purify the flowers three times.

original: aom badzr'a sa ne h'um /
analyzed: aom badzr'a sa ne h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajrasattva hūṃ.

original: stan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: stan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for consecrating the seat.

original: aom badzra b'a sa se h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra b'a sa se h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-vāsasahūṃ.

original: gos byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: gos byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for consecrating the clothes.

original: aom a'a:h'um / zhes pa lus dang ngag dang sems byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //🔽de nas aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti s'a re sarba bighn'an aut+s'a ra ya aut+s'a ra ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um / zhes pa lus dang ngag dang sems byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so // de nas aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti s'a re sarba bighn'an aut+s'a ra ya aut+s'a ra ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ. This is the mantra for consecrating body, speech, and mind.

original: zhes pas me tog sbyi bor bzhag ste bsrung ngo //
analyzed: zhes pas me tog sbyi bor bzhag ste bsrung ngo //
translated: Then, with Oṃ maṇidhari vajrī mahāprati-sārā sarva-vigha-nānut-sāraya ut-sāraya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā, one should place the flowers on one's head and protect oneself.

original: de nas aom badzra bh'u mi h'um /
analyzed: de nas aom badzra bh'u mi h'um /
translated: Then, with Oṃ vajra-bhūmi hūṃ,

original: sa yongs su bzung ba ste 'dis sa'i steng du me tog ma nyams pa bzhag go //
analyzed: sa yongs su bzung ba ste 'dis sa'i steng du me tog ma nyams pa bzhag go //
translated: one should take possession of the ground. With this, one should place undamaged flowers on the ground.

original: de nas aom bighn'anta ka sarba bighn'an aut+s'a ra ya aom bighn'anta ka sarba bighn'an aut+s'a ra ya h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: de nas aom bighn'anta ka sarba bighn'an aut+s'a ra ya aom bighn'anta ka sarba bighn'an aut+s'a ra ya h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Then, with Oṃ vigha-ntaka sarva-vigha-nānut-sāraya oṃ vigha-ntaka sarva-vigha-nānut-sāraya hūṃ svāhā,

original: zhes pas bgegs bskrad do //
analyzed: zhes pas bgegs bskrad do //
translated: one should drive away the obstructors.

original: aom badzra re khe su re khe sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi tishthantu sv'a h'a /🔽zhes pas re kh'a byin gyis brlab bo //🔽de ltar rim pa 'di sngon du 'gro bas bla ma'i mandal byas nas /🔽phyis nor rgyun ma'i mandal gru bzhi pa bya'o //🔽de nas dbus su me tog dgod de /🔽aom shr'i ba su dh'a re sv'a h'a /🔽aom shr'i lakshm'i bh'u ta la b'a si n'i se sv'a h'a /🔽de nas aom ma ni bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽shar du'o // aom p'urnna bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra re khe su re khe sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi tishthantu sv'a h'a / zhes pas re kh'a byin gyis brlab bo // de ltar rim pa 'di sngon du 'gro bas bla ma'i mandal byas nas / phyis nor rgyun ma'i mandal gru bzhi pa bya'o // de nas dbus su me tog dgod de / aom shr'i ba su dh'a re sv'a h'a / aom shr'i lakshm'i bh'u ta la b'a si n'i se sv'a h'a / de nas aom ma ni bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a / shar du'o // aom p'urnna bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra-rekhā, svāhā to the line!🔽🔽Thus, having performed the maṇḍala of the guru with this procedure beforehand,🔽later one should make the square maṇḍala of Vasudharā.🔽Then, having placed flowers in the center,🔽Oṃ śrī vasudhārā svāhā!🔽🔽Oṃ śrī lakṣmī bhūtalavāsini se svāhā!🔽🔽Then, Oṃ maṇibhadra svāhā!🔽🔽in the east,🔽Oṃ pūrṇabhadra svāhā!🔽🔽

original: lho ru'o // aom dha na d'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽nub tu'o // aom bee shra ban'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽byang du'o // aom pi tsi kundal li ne sv'a h'a /🔽me ru'o // aom ke li m'a li ne sv'a h'a /🔽bden bral du'o ;🔽/ aom mu khendr'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽rlung du'o // aom tsa re ndr'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: lho ru'o // aom dha na d'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽nub tu'o // aom bee shra ban'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽byang du'o // aom pi tsi kundal li ne sv'a h'a /🔽me ru'o // aom ke li m'a li ne sv'a h'a /🔽bden bral du'o ;🔽/ aom mu khendr'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽rlung du'o // aom tsa re ndr'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: In the south.🔽Om dhanadaya svaha.🔽In the west.🔽Om vaisravana svaha.🔽In the north.🔽Om picikundalini svaha.🔽In the southeast.🔽Om kelamalini svaha.🔽In the southwest.🔽Om mukundara svaha.🔽In the northwest.🔽Om carendara svaha.🔽

original: dbang ldan du'o //🔽slar yang nang du aom ai l'a de byee sv'a h'a /🔽shar du'o // aom ma ni padme sv'a h'a /🔽lho ru'o // aom badzra dha ra s'a ga ra ni rgho sh'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽nub tu'o // aom badzra dharme h'um sv'a h'a /🔽byang du'o // aom ta bha de byee sv'a h'a /🔽me mtshams su'o //🔽aom gupta de byee sv'a h'a /🔽bden bral du'o //🔽aom sa ra sva t'i de byee sv'a h'a /🔽rlung du'o // aom tsandra k'anta de byee sv'a h'a /🔽dbang ldan du'o //🔽aom phu: sham kha p'a la n'a ga r'a dz'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽ai l'a ma'i rgyab tu'o //🔽aom dzambha la dza lendr'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽de'i g-yas su'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan du'o // slar yang nang du aom ai l'a de byee sv'a h'a / shar du'o // aom ma ni padme sv'a h'a / lho ru'o // aom badzra dha ra s'a ga ra ni rgho sh'a ya sv'a h'a / nub tu'o // aom badzra dharme h'um sv'a h'a / byang du'o // aom ta bha de byee sv'a h'a / me mtshams su'o // aom gupta de byee sv'a h'a / bden bral du'o // aom sa ra sva t'i de byee sv'a h'a / rlung du'o // aom tsandra k'anta de byee sv'a h'a / dbang ldan du'o // aom phu: sham kha p'a la n'a ga r'a dz'a ya sv'a h'a / ai l'a ma'i rgyab tu'o // aom dzambha la dza lendr'a ya sv'a h'a / de'i g-yas su'o //
translated: In the northeast.🔽Again inside: Oṃ īśāna-deva svāhā.🔽In the east.🔽Oṃ maṇi-padme svāhā.🔽In the south.🔽Oṃ vajra-dhara sāgara-nagara-ghosa-āya svāhā.🔽In the west.🔽Oṃ vajra-dharma hūṃ svāhā.🔽In the north.🔽Oṃ tapa-deva svāhā.🔽In the southeast.🔽Oṃ guhya-deva svāhā.🔽In the southwest.🔽Oṃ sara-svati-deva svāhā.🔽In the northwest.🔽Oṃ candra-kānta-deva svāhā.🔽In the northeast.🔽Oṃ pūḥ śaṅkha-pāla nāga-rāja svāhā.🔽Behind Ilā.🔽Oṃ jambhala jalen-dhara svāhā.🔽To his right.

original: de nas nyer spyod @87b lnga'i mchod pa ste /🔽aom ba su dhe sv'a h'a /🔽me tog go //🔽aom ba su dh'a ri ni sv'a h'a /🔽bdug spos so //
analyzed: de nas nyer spyod @87b lnga'i mchod pa ste /🔽aom ba su dhe sv'a h'a /🔽me tog go //🔽aom ba su dh'a ri ni sv'a h'a /🔽bdug spos so //
translated: Then the offering of the twenty-five close offerings.🔽Oṃ vasudhe svāhā🔽is the flower.🔽Oṃ vasudharīṇi svāhā🔽is the incense.🔽

original: aom ba su ma ti shri ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ba su ma ti shri ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vasumati śriya svāhā.

original: dri chab bo //
analyzed: dri chab bo //
translated: This is for the water for the feet.

original: aom ba su dh'a ri ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ba su dh'a ri ni sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vasudhāriṇi svāhā.🔽This is for the lamp.

original: sgron me'o // aom ba su dh'a ra dh'a ri nyee sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sgron me'o // aom ba su dh'a ra dh'a ri nyee sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vasudhāradhāriṇi svāhā.

original: zhal zas so //
analyzed: zhal zas so //
translated: This is for the food.

original: de nas bstod pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas bstod pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then one should recite the praise:

original: aom bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽gang zhig dran pas shin tu yun ring rjes 'brel ba'i //
analyzed: aom bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo // gang zhig dran pas shin tu yun ring rjes 'brel ba'i //
translated: Oṃ. Homage to the Blessed Noble Lady Vasudharā.🔽By the mere recollection of whom

original: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal mi rnams la ni zhi mdzad pa //
analyzed: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal mi rnams la ni zhi mdzad pa //
translated: the suffering of poverty of people is pacified for a very long time,

original: nor rgyun zhes bya dpag bsam shing dang 'dra de la //
analyzed: nor rgyun zhes bya dpag bsam shing dang 'dra de la //
translated: that Vasudharā, who is like a wish-fulfilling tree,

original: 'gro la phan phyir gus pas spyi bos phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'gro la phan phyir gus pas spyi bos phyag bgyi'o //
translated: I respectfully bow my head to her for the benefit of beings.

original: aom dzambha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: aom dzambha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Oṃ. Homage to Jambhala.

original: sha ta ma kha sreg byed gdong bzhi seng ge 'phrog byed dang // nyin mor byed pa rnams kyis zhabs zung la ni phyag byas pa'i //
analyzed: sha ta ma kha sreg byed gdong bzhi seng ge 'phrog byed dang // nyin mor byed pa rnams kyis zhabs zung la ni phyag byas pa'i //
translated: The four-faced one who burns up the hundred-headed Kālakūṭa, the lion who snatches away, and the sun,🔽with these the Blessed One's two feet are worshipped.

original: bcom ldan ka ye sdug bsngal ldan pa bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
analyzed: bcom ldan ka ye sdug bsngal ldan pa bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of me, the one who suffers, O Blessed One, out of compassion

original: de yi gzigs pa rnam par nges pa 'jug pa nyid du mdzod //
analyzed: de yi gzigs pa rnam par nges pa 'jug pa nyid du mdzod //
translated: Your vision is certain to enter into the right path.

original: khyor ba'i chu yis kyang ni khyod mnyes na //
analyzed: khyor ba'i chu yis kyang ni khyod mnyes na //
translated: Even if I were to offer you a handful of water,

original: brtse ldan gzhan la dga' ba lta ci smos //
analyzed: brtse ldan gzhan la dga' ba lta ci smos //
translated: how much more so if I were to offer you the joy of others who are compassionate.

original: bgrang med mchod pa'i chog mang po yis //
analyzed: bgrang med mchod pa'i chog mang po yis //
translated: With many offerings of countless festivals,

original: khyod dang 'dra ba rnyed par dka' ba nyid //
analyzed: khyod dang 'dra ba rnyed par dka' ba nyid //
translated: it is difficult to find one like you.

original: mdun du gnas kyang ltos zhes gsungs min pa //
analyzed: mdun du gnas kyang ltos zhes gsungs min pa //
translated: Even if you were to stand in front of me, I would not say,🔽What is this? My face would be filled with tears.

original: ci zhes bdag gdong mchi ma'i dri ldan dang // gang zhig bde dang ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams ;
analyzed: ci zhes bdag gdong mchi ma'i dri ldan dang // gang zhig bde dang ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams ;
translated: Those who have fallen into good and bad rebirths,

original: /'bad pas rjes tshol brtse bas gzigs par mdzod //🔽snying rje rab tu rgyas pa'i nor ldan pa //
analyzed: /'bad pas rjes tshol brtse bas gzigs par mdzod // snying rje rab tu rgyas pa'i nor ldan pa //
translated: look upon them with compassion and search for them with effort.🔽You, O Bhagavān, who are endowed with the wealth of greatly expanded compassion,

original: bcom ldan khyod nyid bzhugs par gyur kyang ni //🔽sdug bsngal chom rkun bzlog dka' 'di dag gis //
analyzed: bcom ldan khyod nyid bzhugs par gyur kyang ni // sdug bsngal chom rkun bzlog dka' 'di dag gis //
translated: even though you are present,🔽these sufferings, the difficult to avert thieves of suffering,

original: sdug bsngal gyur pa ae ma blun pa nyid //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyur pa ae ma blun pa nyid //
translated: are foolish indeed, having become suffering.

original: mgon po sems can rnams la sman slad du //
analyzed: mgon po sems can rnams la sman slad du //
translated: O Protector, for the sake of sentient beings,

original: sna tshogs rin chen char pa 'bebs zhes grag / bdag la khyod kyi yon tan mtha' gcig tu //
analyzed: sna tshogs rin chen char pa 'bebs zhes grag / bdag la khyod kyi yon tan mtha' gcig tu //
translated: It is said that a rain of various jewels falls.🔽Not even a drop of your qualities

original: bab pa thigs pa tsam yang son ma gyur //
analyzed: bab pa thigs pa tsam yang son ma gyur //
translated: has reached me.

original: khyod kyis rgud pa yang dag 'joms mdzad pas //
analyzed: khyod kyis rgud pa yang dag 'joms mdzad pas //
translated: Since you are the one who completely conquers misfortune,

original: bdag gi rgud pa chu yis me bzhin mdzod //
analyzed: bdag gi rgud pa chu yis me bzhin mdzod //
translated: please extinguish my misfortune like water on a fire.

original: srid pa gsum gyi khur ni bzung gyur pa //
analyzed: srid pa gsum gyi khur ni bzung gyur pa //
translated: The one who bears the burden of the three worlds,

original: thugs rje'i 'dod 'jo gang de khyod las su //
analyzed: thugs rje'i 'dod 'jo gang de khyod las su //
translated: that wish-fulfilling jewel of compassion is you.🔽Even inanimate objects such as a good vase,

original: sems dang mi ldan bum pa bzang po dang // dpag bsam rkang 'thung dang ni yid bzhin nor //
analyzed: sems dang mi ldan bum pa bzang po dang // dpag bsam rkang 'thung dang ni yid bzhin nor //
translated: a wish-fulfilling tree, and a wish-fulfilling jewel

original: de dag kyang ni sems can bde byed na //
analyzed: de dag kyang ni sems can bde byed na //
translated: bring happiness to sentient beings.

original: bcom ldan brtse bas bdag mdzad lta ci smos //
analyzed: bcom ldan brtse bas bdag mdzad lta ci smos //
translated: What need is there to mention the Bhagavān, who acts out of love?

original: rmugs 'dzin chu dbang zhes ni gang gi mtshan //
analyzed: rmugs 'dzin chu dbang zhes ni gang gi mtshan //
translated: The one whose name is “Varuṇa, the Lord of the Ocean,”🔽the one who holds it,

original: 'dzin par byed pa de ni mod la yang //🔽padma'i @88a * //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa de ni mod la yang // padma'i @88a * //
translated: will immediately

original: 'byung gnas kyi ni padma bzhin //
analyzed: 'byung gnas kyi ni padma bzhin //
translated: be like a lotus in a lake of lotuses.

original: de yi phun sum tshogs pa rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi phun sum tshogs pa rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: His abundance will increase.

original: de ltar bcom ldan khyod ni mdun byas nas //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan khyod ni mdun byas nas //
translated: In this way, Bhagavān, having made you my witness,

original: smre sngags rnam par bton las bsod nams gang //
analyzed: smre sngags rnam par bton las bsod nams gang //
translated: The merit of lamenting

original: de yi 'bras bu nye bar sbyin pa yin //
analyzed: de yi 'bras bu nye bar sbyin pa yin //
translated: is the result of giving.🔽May beings become like you, O Blessed One.

original: 'gro ba bcom ldan khyod bzhin 'gyur bar shog / de ltar rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod de /
analyzed: 'gro ba bcom ldan khyod bzhin 'gyur bar shog / de ltar rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod de /
translated: Having praised the Lord of the Water, Varuṇa, with this king of praises,

original: de nas gser la sogs pa'i snod 'o mas yongs su bkang ste b'i dza p'ur ka dang bcas pa'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gser la sogs pa'i snod 'o mas yongs su bkang ste b'i dza p'ur ka dang bcas pa'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
translated: then one should offer a welcome drink with milk filling a vessel of gold and so forth, along with camphor.🔽Oṃ oṃ oṃ

original: aom aukke aukke /
analyzed: aom aukke aukke /
translated: bhuṃ bhuṃ bhuṃ🔽oṃ oṃ oṃ🔽bhuṃ bhuṃ bhuṃ🔽oṃ oṃ oṃ

original: bhukke bhukke / tsukke tsukke /🔽b'arsha ni pra barsha ni /
analyzed: bhukke bhukke / tsukke tsukke / b'arsha ni pra barsha ni /
translated: bhuṃ bhuṃ bhuṃ🔽oṃ oṃ oṃ🔽bhuṃ bhuṃ bhuṃ

original: ni:p'a da ni sv'a h'a /🔽mchod yon gyi sngags so //
analyzed: ni:p'a da ni sv'a h'a / mchod yon gyi sngags so //
translated: oṃ oṃ oṃ🔽bhuṃ bhuṃ bhuṃ🔽oṃ oṃ oṃ🔽bhuṃ bhuṃ bhuṃ🔽oṃ oṃ oṃ🔽bhuṃ bhuṃ bhuṃ🔽oṃ oṃ oṃ🔽bhuṃ bhuṃ bhuṃ

original: aom badzra dharme h'u sv'a h'a /🔽aom ta bha de byee sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra dharme h'u sv'a h'a / aom ta bha de byee sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra-dharme hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ taṃ bhadre devī svāhā.

original: aom shri kunta de byee sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shri kunta de byee sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī kuṃta devī svāhā.

original: aom shr'i ra sv'a t'i de byee sv'a h'a /🔽aom shr'i tsandra k'ant'a de byee sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i ra sv'a t'i de byee sv'a h'a / aom shr'i tsandra k'ant'a de byee sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī rāvaṭa devī svāhā.🔽Oṃ śrī candrakāntā devī svāhā.

original: aom shr'i sham kha ni dh'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i sham kha ni dh'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī śaṃkha-nidhāna-dhāraya svāhā.

original: aom shr'i padma ne dh'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i padma ne dh'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī padma-nidhāna-dhāraya svāhā.

original: aom shr'i aoshtoo ma h'a yakshi n'i bhyo na ma:sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i aoshtoo ma h'a yakshi n'i bhyo na ma:sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī aṣṭau mahā-yakṣiṇī-bhyo namaḥ svāhā.

original: thams cad mchod pa'i don du h'um sv'a h'a'o //
analyzed: thams cad mchod pa'i don du h'um sv'a h'a'o //
translated: For the sake of worshipping all, hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom bcom ldan 'das ma dpal nor rgyun ma ye shes kyi sku mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal @89a * //
analyzed: aom bcom ldan 'das ma dpal nor rgyun ma ye shes kyi sku mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal @89a * //
translated: Oṃ. I pay homage to the Blessed Lady Śrī Mahālakṣmī, who possesses the wisdom body.

original: lo ; / nam mkhar 'gro ma thad kar mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba skye gnas mnyam pa med pa'i yon tan gyi gter gser dang rin po che 'khyog pa /
analyzed: lo ; / nam mkhar 'gro ma thad kar mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba skye gnas mnyam pa med pa'i yon tan gyi gter gser dang rin po che 'khyog pa /
translated: You who are like a wish-fulfilling gem, a treasure of good qualities,

original: skye bo mang po'i nor spel ba'i rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i char lta bu /
analyzed: skye bo mang po'i nor spel ba'i rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i char lta bu /
translated: a rain of jewels from the ocean that increases the wealth of many people,

original: mchog tu dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid mtha' yas mdzad dam /
analyzed: mchog tu dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid mtha' yas mdzad dam /
translated: you who have the splendor of infinite purity,

original: rgyal ba dang bkra shis pa'i glu dbyangs nges par sgrog par mdzad ma /
analyzed: rgyal ba dang bkra shis pa'i glu dbyangs nges par sgrog par mdzad ma /
translated: you who sing the songs of victory and auspiciousness,

original: chu bo'i gser mdog bzang po'i gzugs 'dzin ma /
analyzed: chu bo'i gser mdog bzang po'i gzugs 'dzin ma /
translated: you who have the beautiful golden form of the river,

original: nor bu'i rna cha dang do shal dang ske rags 'dzin na ma /
analyzed: nor bu'i rna cha dang do shal dang ske rags 'dzin na ma /
translated: you who hold jewel earrings, necklaces, and belts,

original: gser bzang po'i rgyan 'dzin na ma /
analyzed: gser bzang po'i rgyan 'dzin na ma /
translated: you who hold golden ornaments,

original: srid pa'i btson ra'i sdug bsngal rnam par sel bar mdzad pa'i lha mo khyod kyi zhabs zung la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: srid pa'i btson ra'i sdug bsngal rnam par sel bar mdzad pa'i lha mo khyod kyi zhabs zung la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage at the feet of the goddess who removes the suffering of the prison of existence.

original: de nas yi ge brgya pa dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas yi ge brgya pa dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then one should recite the hundred-syllable mantra and the praise of the one hundred and eight names.

original: de nas smon lam brjod de /
analyzed: de nas smon lam brjod de /
translated: Then one should make aspirations:

original: bsod nams 'di yis sems can kun //
analyzed: bsod nams 'di yis sems can kun //
translated: By this merit, may all sentient beings

original: rtag tu dbul ba'i nad spangs nas //🔽bcom ldan thub dbang ye shes ni //
analyzed: rtag tu dbul ba'i nad spangs nas // bcom ldan thub dbang ye shes ni //
translated: Always be free from the disease of poverty,🔽And may they quickly attain

original: myur ba nyid du thob par shog //
analyzed: myur ba nyid du thob par shog //
translated: The wisdom of the Bhagavān, the Lord of Sages.

original: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
translated: Namo ratnatrayāya.

original: bha ga ba ti ba su dh'a re /
analyzed: bha ga ba ti ba su dh'a re /
translated: Bhagavatī vasudhārā.

original: garbha dz'i bsam raksha ni /
analyzed: garbha dz'i bsam raksha ni /
translated: Garbha-jīva rakṣaṇi.

original: pha la ha ste /
analyzed: pha la ha ste /
translated: Phalahaste.

original: di bya r'u pe /
analyzed: di bya r'u pe /
translated: Dibyārūpe.

original: ba su dhe /
analyzed: ba su dhe /
translated: Vasude.

original: ba ra de /🔽shi bam ka ri /
analyzed: ba ra de / shi bam ka ri /
translated: Varada.🔽Śivakari.

original: sh'antim ka ri /
analyzed: sh'antim ka ri /
translated: Śāntikari.

original: pushtim ka ri /
analyzed: pushtim ka ri /
translated: Puṣṭikari.

original: ba la bardha ni /
analyzed: ba la bardha ni /
translated: Balavardhani.

original: bha ya n'a sha ni /
analyzed: bha ya n'a sha ni /
translated: Bhayānāśani.

original: sarba du sht'an bhanydza bhanydza /
analyzed: sarba du sht'an bhanydza bhanydza /
translated: Sarva-duṣṭān bhajani bhajani.

original: stambha stambha / aa mi todbha be /
analyzed: stambha stambha / aa mi todbha be /
translated: Stambha stambha. Amitodbhave.

original: ma ma k'ar++yam ku ru ku ru /
analyzed: ma ma k'ar++yam ku ru ku ru /
translated: Mama kāryaṃ kuru kuru.

original: siddhi ba su dh'a re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: siddhi ba su dh'a re sv'a h'a /
translated: Siddhī vasudhāre svāhā.

original: dpal lha mo nor rgyun ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal lha mo nor rgyun ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so /
translated: The complete ritual of the maṇḍala of the glorious goddess Vasudhārā is finished.

original: // / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu'i yon gnas dam pa /
analyzed: // / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu'i yon gnas dam pa /
translated: This Dharma discourse is the supreme object of offering for all beings, including the gods,

original: rje btsun gnas brtan chen po dpal zhva dmar cod pa na 'dzin pa bzhi pa'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' bzhin /
analyzed: rje btsun gnas brtan chen po dpal zhva dmar cod pa na 'dzin pa bzhi pa'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' bzhin /
translated: In accordance with the words of the venerable elder, the glorious one with red feet, the fourth holder of the crown,

original: zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong dharma p'a la bha dras bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong dharma p'a la bha dras bsgyur ba'o//
translated: the translator from Zhalu, the monk Dharma Pālabhadra, translated this.
